title: CivicAtlas – Public Infrastructure Map
goal: Visualize all public projects on an interactive map with cost and stage info.
why_it_matters: Citizens rarely know how infrastructure funds are distributed spatially.
data: Infrastructure project datasets, budgets, GPS coordinates.
ai: Geospatial clustering; optional anomaly detection (budget per capita).
workflow: Filter by department, cost, or progress.
outcome: Perfect for front-end + data-engineering synergy demo.
